mapper.update:
update t_fixing
fixing_sn = #{fixingSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
production_data = #{productionData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_fixing set fixing_sn = #{fixingSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, production_data = #{productionData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opening_data = #{openingData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, closing_data = #{closingData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vender = #{vender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyid = #{companyid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_group = #{userGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from t_fixing where is_delete='n'
and companyid=#{companyid}
and fixing_sn like CONCAT('%',#{fixingSn},'%')
order by id desc
mapper.update: update t_fixing set is_delete='y' where id=#{id}
